Directions: Place wafers flat side down in paper-or foil-lined muffin cups; set aside.  In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.  Add the eggs, lemon juice and vanilla; beat well.  Fill muffin cups three-fourths full.  Place on a baking sheet.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 17-20 minutes or until top is set.  Cool on a wire rack for 20 minutes.  Top each cheesecake with 2 teaspoons preserves.  Refrigerate until serving.
